verses.plain: And the word of the LORD came unto me, saying,
Son of man, What is the vine tree more than any tree, or than a branch which is among the trees of the forest?

tokens.t: Son of man, What is the vine tree more than any tree,
a branch which is among the trees of the forest?

verses.plain: Shall wood be taken thereof to do any work? or will men take a pin of it to hang any vessel thereon?

tokens.t: Shall wood be taken thereof to do any work? or will
take a pin of it to hang any vessel thereon?

verses.plain: Behold, it is cast into the fire for fuel; the fire devoureth both the ends of it, and the midst of it is burned. Is it meet for any work?

tokens.t: Behold, it is cast into the fire for fuel; the fire devoureth both the ends of it, and the midst of it is burned. Is it meet for

verses.plain: Behold, when it was whole, it was meet for no work: how much less shall it be meet yet for any work, when the fire hath devoured it, and it is burned?

tokens.t: Behold, when it was whole, it was meet for no work: how much less shall it be meet yet for
work, when the fire hath devoured it, and it is burned?

verses.plain: ¶ Therefore thus saith the Lord GOD; As the vine tree among the trees of the forest, which I have given to the fire for fuel, so will I give the inhabitants of Jerusalem.

tokens.t: ; As the vine tree among the trees of the forest, which I have given to the fire for fuel, so will I give the inhabitants of Jerusalem.

verses.plain: And I will set my face against them; they shall go out from one fire, and another fire shall devour them; and ye shall know that I am the LORD, when I set my face against them.

tokens.t: And I will set my face against them; they shall go out from
fire shall devour them; and ye shall know that I
, when I set my face against them.

verses.plain: And I will make the land desolate, because they have committed a trespass, saith the Lord GOD.

tokens.t: And I will make the land desolate, because they have committed a trespass, saith the Lord

footnotes.text: Is it…: Heb. Will it prosper?
